name: The 3rd Night (Web Version)
description:
The 3rd Night was a short 3D experiment made in Construct 2 (using the Q3D plugin). We decided to give it a shot and made this in around 15 days, just in time for the Haunted PS1's Horrifying Halloween game jam.

For the Windows executable version, follow this link.

You can also grab the source here. 

Please note you must have the following installed to open it:
A licensed version of Construct 2
The Q3D plugin by QuaziGNRLnose
The Simple MouseLock plugin by TheRealDannyyy
The ValerypopoffJS plugin by valerypopoff

You're free to use/reuse the code however you see fit, but all the assets and art are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. All the sounds were taken from freesound.org and are licensed under CC0.

Controls:

WSAD (or ZSQD) - Walk around Left mouse button - Interact C - Crouch  Shift - Run
